title: naadha sampoorana
sahitya:
nAda sampUrna sadAnanda nilayE
vEdOdbhava sAmagAna priyE

anupallavi

mAtA nI pAdamE sharaNantinE jaganmAtA
AdAra suswaranAsikAbhUshini

caraNam

gatamu nE jEsina nEramu nOrcina
vidharaNa vivarimpa valEnA
satatamu nI dhari cintincina vidula
padamu kolicE varamicina talli
